title: Lost promos due to client crashing
body:
Hi there,

This has happened to me twice now, for the first time I can see that the client is repairing itself.

I've failed two promos in the past few weeks, both due to re-make with the client crashing.

Is there anything in place to address this? Seems a bit unfair that I now have to go win 4 games to get back to where I could have been?
